strapiPost.title: Last Call, Free Beer
strapiPost.content:
It’s the last week of Namida Lab’s Tears on Tap Tour collecting tears from volunteers at local breweries. 

  • Purpose: Namida Lab has a mission to develop novel breast cancer diagnostics from the proteins in tears. And because tears cannot simply be bought like blood samples, the lab is collecting them. 
  • Locations: Columbus House is hosting the tour tonight. Ozark Beer Co is on the lineup for Friday, and Boston Mountain Brewing for Saturday. Namida Lab is covering the cost of 1 beer for every participant who donates a tear. Grab your friends, donate tears and get free beers.

For more information, click HERE.
